| An old Gypsy woman:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is [herbivorous](/wiki/Herbivore "Herbivore").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is female.
* is normally generated [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* can pick up [magical items](/wiki/Magical_item "Magical item").
* lets you close unless attacked.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                                                                                                                 |
| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            | [\[1\]](#cite_note-1)                                                                                                                                                           |

The **old Gypsy woman** is a [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") added in the [Noble patch](/wiki/Noble "Noble"), implemented in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). She is the [quest leader](/wiki/Quest_leader "Quest leader") for the [default Noble quest](/wiki/Noble_quest "Noble quest")—the quest which [human](/wiki/Human "Human"), [vampiric](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_dNetHack\) "Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)") and [incantifier](/wiki/Incantifier_\(starting_race\) "Incantifier (starting race)") Nobles receive in [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), and all Nobles receive in [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM").

She is unusual among quest leaders in that, while the quest text seems to imply that she is an ally and possibly a past mentor to the player, like other quest leaders, she does not belong to the same "[role](/wiki/Role "Role")" as the player—that is to say, she is not a [Noble](/wiki/Noble "Noble") herself. She is not generated on the [throne](/wiki/Throne "Throne") in the home level, as [that belongs to you](/wiki/Noble_quest#Home_level "Noble quest"), and she considers it a cruel joke to be offered the [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact"), the symbol of your authority. ("How cruel you are to taunt an old woman. My curse, the curse of all my kin, prevents me from ever finding a home of my own.")

Although the old Gypsy woman is incorporated into [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM") as the Noble quest leader, she does not provide [fortune-telling](/wiki/Gypsy#Fortune_telling "Gypsy") services like a [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") [gypsy](/wiki/Gypsy "Gypsy")—though her messages do incorporate the use of Tarot cards.

## References

Reference: [Chris' Noble Patch](https://github.com/Chris-plus-alphanumericgibberish/dnethack/commit/980737c5e4fca9299af8f797d159182f7c2bc242)

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/monst.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 4689](/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.4.3/src/monst.c#line4689 "Source:NetHack 3.4.3/src/monst.c")
html:
Old Gypsy woman

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ old Gypsy woman
Difficulty 23
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, Cast 2d8 clerical
@ old Gypsy woman
Difficulty 23
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, Cast 2d8 clerical

Base level 20
Base experience 593
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 40
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances poison

An old Gypsy woman:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is herbivorous.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is female.
  • is normally generated peaceful.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • lets you close unless attacked.
  • can be seen through infravision.
Reference [1]

The old Gypsy woman is a monster added in the Noble patch, implemented in dNetHack and SlashTHEM. She is the quest leader for the default Noble quest—the quest which human, vampiric and incantifier Nobles receive in dNetHack, and all Nobles receive in SlashTHEM.

She is unusual among quest leaders in that, while the quest text seems to imply that she is an ally and possibly a past mentor to the player, like other quest leaders, she does not belong to the same "role" as the player—that is to say, she is not a Noble herself. She is not generated on the throne in the home level, as that belongs to you, and she considers it a cruel joke to be offered the quest artifact, the symbol of your authority. ("How cruel you are to taunt an old woman. My curse, the curse of all my kin, prevents me from ever finding a home of my own.")

Although the old Gypsy woman is incorporated into SlashTHEM as the Noble quest leader, she does not provide fortune-telling services like a SLASH'EM gypsy—though her messages do incorporate the use of Tarot cards.

References

Reference: Chris' Noble Patch

  1. ↑ src/monst.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 4689

The '''old Gypsy woman''' is a [[monster]] added in the [[Noble|Noble patch]], implemented in [[dNetHack]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. She is the [[quest leader]] for the [[Noble quest|default Noble quest]]—the quest which [[human]], [[Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)|vampiric]] and [[Incantifier (starting race)|incantifier]] Nobles receive in [[dNetHack]], and all Nobles receive in [[SlashTHEM]].

She is unusual among quest leaders in that, while the quest text seems to imply that she is an ally and possibly a past mentor to the player, like other quest leaders, she does not belong to the same "[[role]]" as the player—that is to say, she is not a [[Noble]] herself. She is not generated on the [[throne]] in the home level, as [[Noble quest#Home level|that belongs to you]], and she considers it a cruel joke to be offered the [[quest artifact]], the symbol of your authority. ("How cruel you are to taunt an old woman. My curse, the curse of all my kin, prevents me from ever finding a home of my own.")

Although the old Gypsy woman is incorporated into [[SlashTHEM]] as the Noble quest leader, she does not provide [[Gypsy#Fortune telling|fortune-telling]] services like a [[SLASH'EM]] [[gypsy]]—though her messages do incorporate the use of Tarot cards.

==References==
